Engasjert og løsningsorientert systemutv.en: Engaged and solution-oriented system developer with over 12 years of experience in web and system development. Specialist in frontend technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, TypeScript), with a solid background in Java and REST-based backend solutions. Passionate about the web platform, universal design, innovation, and agile processes, and have extensive experience as a technical leader and architect. Known for taking responsibility, communicating well, and sharing expertise with the team. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.

Moderniserer web-applikasjoner på tvers.en: Modernizing web applications across several teams at a large government agency, focusing on React/TypeScript, Node/Express, and WCAG/UU compliance.

Utvikler både backend (Java/OpenShift) o.en: Developing both backend (Java/OpenShift) and frontend, with special responsibility for UI architecture and automated testing (Playwright, Cucumber).

Hjelper teamene med problemløsning i fro.en: Helping teams with problem-solving in the frontend stack and ensuring that universal design is maintained.

Har bidratt til å sette opp CI/CD-pipeli.en: Contributed to setting up CI/CD pipelines in Jenkins for seamless deployment

I Tripletex startet jeg i 2012 å lage mo.en: At Tripletex, I started in 2012 to create mobile-adapted websites for the accounting system: I was responsible for both user design and implementation of essential functions such as time tracking, project management, viewing large accounting reports, adapted to a small screen. In 2014, I took on the main responsibility for all frontend development (initially as a web architect, and later as tech lead), and held this position until I left the company in 2021. For many years, I was also responsible for training new employees in the entire technology stack of the company.

Gjennom årene har jeg produsert og jobbe.en: Over the years, I have produced and worked on, among other things: Onboarding system, help system, common component library in both JSP and React, form validation, period selectors, dialogs, etc. In addition, I have developed a competence and knack for using the browser's developer tools to uncover bugs in frontend applications where other seasoned developers have been completely stuck.

De siste årene var jeg sentral i arkitek.en: Over the past few years, I was central to the architecture team, setting guidelines for web architecture while assisting all teams with development and coordination of functionality. When I saw that different teams had created similar components, I took the responsibility to turn them into solid and well-tested common components.

Ledet front-end-utviklingen i et stort t.en: Led the front-end development in a large team delivering a web-based solution for accounting, payroll, and project management.

Stod ansvarlig for å modernisere hele fr.en: Responsible for modernizing the entire frontend stack with React, Flow/TypeScript, Node.js, and SCSS, as well as introducing CI/CD routines.

Planla og gjennomførte migrering fra eld.en: Planned and executed migration from older Java/JSP-based pages to modern React-based components.

Koordinerte prosjekter som forbedret bru.en: Coordinated projects that improved user experience (UX), usability, and responsive design across hundreds of pages.

Teknisk leder, med fokus på team-samarbe.en: Technical leader, focusing on team collaboration, work methodology, and technical direction.

Implementerte et JavaScript-basert syste.en: Implemented a JavaScript-based system to parse RDF/A syntax in HTML documents to guide contextual advertising.

Bidro til AI-plattformen for personalise.en: Contributed to the AI platform for ad personalization by building a visual graph model based on metadata.

Vitenskapelig assistent, gruppelærer, ek.en: Scientific Assistant, Group Teacher, Exam Sensor

Utforsket muligheten til å bruke semanti.en: Explored the possibility of using semantic technologies to visualize and distribute the content of the Statistics Bank (a collaboration between UiO, DNV, SSB, and Cambridge Semantics).

Eksamenssensor i Logikk og beregninger (.en: Exam sensor in Logic and Calculations (INF1800).

Underviste i Logikk og beregninger og In.en: Taught Logic and Calculations and Introduction to Cognitive Sciences.

Fordypning i språkteknologi og informasj.en: Specialization in language technology and information extraction. Master's thesis on automatic diagnosis using NLP and ontologies.

Fordypning i objektorientert (Java) og f.en: Specialization in object-oriented (Java) and functional programming (Scheme, Common Lisp), as well as language technology and philosophy.
